Posted By: Dingo777 (10/24/2009 3:47:29 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
yeah i cant predict this getting into play by hardcasting it... by the time you play this card your opponents are probably dead... and you are getting it into play via transmuter then you will probably go for the darksteel colossus or something easier to reanimate.  
  
urza's lands and mana vaults are a must if you would even consider putting this in a deck. and even then, for 7 mana you would be better off throwing down platinum angel (it is just as easy to kill)
posts.html:
yeah i cant predict this getting into play by hardcasting it... by the time you play this card your opponents are probably dead... and you are getting it into play via transmuter then you will probably go for the darksteel colossus or something easier to reanimate.

urza's lands and mana vaults are a must if you would even consider putting this in a deck. and even then, for 7 mana you would be better off throwing down platinum angel (it is just as easy to kill)
